    Subclasses of CheckersScene in scene 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  GameScene
    Scene handler for the game play itself.
    class  MenuScene
    This scene handles each of the views for the pre-game menu, including: - Main Menu - Difficulty Selection - High Scores - How to play
